resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107486</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107486</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Madison Materials Research Science and Technology and Engineering Center</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Madison Material-Forschung Wissenschaft und 
Technologie-und Technik-Mitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de recherches de matériaux de Madison 
et centre de technologie et d'ingénierie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência da pesquisa dos materiais de Madison e 
centro da tecnologia e da engenharia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di ricerca dei materiali de Madison e 
centro di ingegneria e di tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο ερευνητικής επιστήμης υλικών του Μάντισον και 
τεχνολογίας και εφαρμοσμένης μηχανικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia de la investigación de los materiales de 
Madison y centro de la tecnología y de la ingeniería</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">introduces students to nanotechnology. Learn how we can see atoms, manipulate them, and create nano-architectural wonders. Watch nanoscience demonstrations. Read profiles of nanotechnologists. Look through nanotechnology slide shows and course descriptions. Manipulate an interactive polyhedral model.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Kursteilnehmer zum nanotechnology vor. 
Erlernen Sie, wie wir Atome sehen, sie manipulieren und 
nano-architektonische Wunder erstellen können. Überwachen Sie 
nanoscience Demonstrationen. Lesen Sie Profile von 
nanotechnologists. Schauen Sie durch nanotechnology 
Diavorführungen und Kursbeschreibungen. Manipulieren Sie ein 
interaktives polyhedral Modell.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente des étudiants au nanotechnology. 
Apprenez comment nous pouvons voir des atomes, les manipuler, et
créer des merveilles de nano-architectural. Observez les 
démonstrations de nanoscience. Lisez les profils des 
nanotechnologists. Regardez par des projections de diapositives 
de nanotechnology et des descriptions de cours. Manipulez un 
modèle polyhedral interactif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">introduz estudantes ao nanotechnology. 
Aprenda como nós podemos ver átomos, os manipular, e criar 
maravilhas nano-nano-architectural. Preste atenção a 
demonstrações do nanoscience. Leia perfis dos 
nanotechnologists. Olhe com as mostras de corrediça do 
nanotechnology e as descrições do curso. Manipule um modelo 
polyhedral interativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">introduce gli allievi al nanotechnology. 
Impari come possiamo vedere gli atomi, maneggiarli e creare i 
wonders nano-architettonici. Guardi le dimostrazioni di 
nanoscience. Legga i profili dei nanotechnologists. 
Osservi con le proiezioni di diapositive di nanotechnology e le 
descrizioni di corso. Maneggi un modello polyhedral interattivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εισάγει τους σπουδαστές στη νανοτεχνολογία. 
Μάθετε πώς μπορούμε να δούμε τα άτομα, να τα 
χειριστούμε, και να δημιουργήσουμε νανο-αρχιτεκτονικό 
αναρωτιόμαστε. Προσέξτε τις επιδείξεις nanoscience. 
Διαβάστε τα σχεδιαγράμματα των nanotechnologists. 
Κοιτάξτε μέσω των επιδείξεων φωτογραφικών διαφανειών 
νανοτεχνολογίας και των περιγραφών σειράς μαθημάτων. 
Χειριστείτε ένα διαλογικό πολύεδρο μοντέλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">introduce a estudiantes al nanotechnology. 
Aprenda cómo podemos ver los átomos, manipularlos, y crear 
maravillas nano-arquitecto'nicas. Mire las demostraciones del 
nanoscience. Lea los perfiles de nanotechnologists. Mire 
con demostraciones de diapositiva del nanotechnology y descripciones 
del curso. Manipule un modelo polyhedral interactivo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107486</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/madison-materials-research-science-and-technology-and-engineering-center</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
